00085 void
00086 InitLLVMUtil(llvm::LLVMContext *ctx, Target target) {
00087     LLVMTypes::VoidType = llvm::Type::getVoidTy(*ctx);
00088     LLVMTypes::VoidPointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(llvm::Type::getInt8Ty(*ctx), 0);
00089 
00090     LLVMTypes::BoolType = llvm::Type::getInt1Ty(*ctx);
00091     LLVMTypes::Int8Type = llvm::Type::getInt8Ty(*ctx);
00092     LLVMTypes::Int16Type = llvm::Type::getInt16Ty(*ctx);
00093     LLVMTypes::Int32Type = llvm::Type::getInt32Ty(*ctx);
00094     LLVMTypes::Int64Type = llvm::Type::getInt64Ty(*ctx);
00095     LLVMTypes::FloatType = llvm::Type::getFloatTy(*ctx);
00096     LLVMTypes::DoubleType = llvm::Type::getDoubleTy(*ctx);
00097 
00098     LLVMTypes::Int8PointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::Int8Type, 0);
00099     LLVMTypes::Int16PointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::Int16Type, 0);
00100     LLVMTypes::Int32PointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::Int32Type, 0);
00101     LLVMTypes::Int64PointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::Int64Type, 0);
00102     LLVMTypes::FloatPointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::FloatType, 0);
00103     LLVMTypes::DoublePointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::DoubleType, 0);
00104 
00105     // Note that both the mask and bool vectors are vector of int32s
00106     // (not i1s).  LLVM ends up generating much better SSE code with
00107     // this representation.
00108     LLVMTypes::MaskType = LLVMTypes::BoolVectorType =
00109         llvm::VectorType::get(llvm::Type::getInt32Ty(*ctx), target.vectorWidth);
00110 
00111     LLVMTypes::Int1VectorType = 
00112         llvm::VectorType::get(llvm::Type::getInt1Ty(*ctx), target.vectorWidth);
00113     LLVMTypes::Int8VectorType = 
00114         llvm::VectorType::get(LLVMTypes::Int8Type, target.vectorWidth);
00115     LLVMTypes::Int16VectorType = 
00116         llvm::VectorType::get(LLVMTypes::Int16Type, target.vectorWidth);
00117     LLVMTypes::Int32VectorType = 
00118         llvm::VectorType::get(LLVMTypes::Int32Type, target.vectorWidth);
00119     LLVMTypes::Int64VectorType = 
00120         llvm::VectorType::get(LLVMTypes::Int64Type, target.vectorWidth);
00121     LLVMTypes::FloatVectorType = 
00122         llvm::VectorType::get(LLVMTypes::FloatType, target.vectorWidth);
00123     LLVMTypes::DoubleVectorType = 
00124         llvm::VectorType::get(LLVMTypes::DoubleType, target.vectorWidth);
00125 
00126     LLVMTypes::Int8VectorPointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::Int8VectorType, 0);
00127     LLVMTypes::Int16VectorPointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::Int16VectorType, 0);
00128     LLVMTypes::Int32VectorPointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::Int32VectorType, 0);
00129     LLVMTypes::Int64VectorPointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::Int64VectorType, 0);
00130     LLVMTypes::FloatVectorPointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::FloatVectorType, 0);
00131     LLVMTypes::DoubleVectorPointerType = llvm::PointerType::get(LLVMTypes::DoubleVectorType, 0);
00132 
00133     LLVMTypes::VoidPointerVectorType = 
00134         llvm::ArrayType::get(LLVMTypes::VoidPointerType, target.vectorWidth);
00135 
00136     LLVMTrue = llvm::ConstantInt::getTrue(*ctx);
00137     LLVMFalse = llvm::ConstantInt::getFalse(*ctx);
00138 
00139     std::vector<llvm::Constant *> maskOnes;
00140     llvm::Constant *onMask = NULL;
00141     onMask = llvm::ConstantInt::get(llvm::Type::getInt32Ty(*ctx), -1,
00142                                     true /*signed*/); // 0xffffffff
00143 
00144     for (int i = 0; i < target.vectorWidth; ++i)
00145         maskOnes.push_back(onMask);
00146     LLVMMaskAllOn = llvm::ConstantVector::get(maskOnes);
00147 
00148     std::vector<llvm::Constant *> maskZeros;
00149     llvm::Constant *offMask = NULL;
00150     offMask = llvm::ConstantInt::get(llvm::Type::getInt32Ty(*ctx), 0,
00151                                      true /*signed*/);
00152 
00153     for (int i = 0; i < target.vectorWidth; ++i)
00154         maskZeros.push_back(offMask);
00155     LLVMMaskAllOff = llvm::ConstantVector::get(maskZeros);
00156 }

00159 llvm::ConstantInt *
00160 LLVMInt8(int8_t ival) {
00161     return llvm::ConstantInt::get(llvm::Type::getInt8Ty(*g->ctx), ival,
00162                                   true /*signed*/);
00163 }

00166 llvm::ConstantInt *
00167 LLVMUInt8(uint8_t ival) {
00168     return llvm::ConstantInt::get(llvm::Type::getInt8Ty(*g->ctx), ival,
00169                                   false /*unsigned*/);
00170 }

00222 LLVMDouble(double dval) {

00226 
00227 llvm::Constant *
00228 LLVMInt8Vector(int8_t ival) {
00229     llvm::Constant *v = LLVMInt8(ival);
00230     std::vector<llvm::Constant *> vals;
00231     for (int i = 0; i < g->target.vectorWidth; ++i)
00232         vals.push_back(v);
00233     return llvm::ConstantVector::get(vals);
00234 }
00235 
00236 
00237 llvm::Constant *
00238 LLVMInt8Vector(const int8_t *ivec) {
00239     std::vector<llvm::Constant *> vals;
00240     for (int i = 0; i < g->target.vectorWidth; ++i)
00241         vals.push_back(LLVMInt8(ivec[i]));
00242     return llvm::ConstantVector::get(vals);
00243 }

00417 llvm::Constant *
00418 LLVMBoolVector(bool b) {
00419     llvm::Constant *v;
00420     if (LLVMTypes::BoolVectorType == LLVMTypes::Int32VectorType) 
00421         v = llvm::ConstantInt::get(LLVMTypes::Int32Type, b ? 0xffffffff : 0, 
00422                                    false /*unsigned*/);
00423     else {
00424         assert(LLVMTypes::BoolVectorType->getElementType() == 
00425                llvm::Type::getInt1Ty(*g->ctx));
00426         v = b ? LLVMTrue : LLVMFalse;
00427     }
00428 
00429     std::vector<llvm::Constant *> vals;
00430     for (int i = 0; i < g->target.vectorWidth; ++i)
00431         vals.push_back(v);
00432     return llvm::ConstantVector::get(vals);
00433 }
00434 
00435 
00436 llvm::Constant *
00437 LLVMBoolVector(const bool *bvec) {
00438     std::vector<llvm::Constant *> vals;
00439     for (int i = 0; i < g->target.vectorWidth; ++i) {
00440         llvm::Constant *v;
00441         if (LLVMTypes::BoolVectorType == LLVMTypes::Int32VectorType) 
00442             v = llvm::ConstantInt::get(LLVMTypes::Int32Type, bvec[i] ? 0xffffffff : 0, 
00443                                        false /*unsigned*/);
00444         else {
00445             assert(LLVMTypes::BoolVectorType->getElementType() == 
00446                    llvm::Type::getInt1Ty(*g->ctx));
00447             v = bvec[i] ? LLVMTrue : LLVMFalse;
00448         }
00449 
00450         vals.push_back(v);
00451     }
00452     return llvm::ConstantVector::get(vals);
00453 }

00456 LLVM_TYPE_CONST llvm::ArrayType *
00457 LLVMPointerVectorType(LLVM_TYPE_CONST llvm::Type *t) {
00458     // NOTE: ArrayType, not VectorType
00459     return llvm::ArrayType::get(llvm::PointerType::get(t, 0), 
00460                                 g->target.vectorWidth);
00461 }
